title: Learn about the interpretation of banknotes in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and the interpretation of a dream about receiving banknotes.

preview.html: Paper money in a dream: Money is one of the things that gives people a sense of comfort. It is a big dream for most people, if not all, and seeing it automatically gives a feeling of happiness, what we will learn in this article. Paper money in a dream: A man seeing a paper currency in a dream is evidence that he will give birth to a healthy child in the future. The future will be fair with him, God willing. Paper money in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing paper money in a dream indicates the suffering and crises that the person will experience in the coming period. Seeing paper money in a dream symbolizes hopes that the dreamer will make every effort to succeed and achieve his goal, but he He will suffer a little from some crises. Ibn Sirin mentioned that if a person sees in a dream that he is taking some money from the dead, this indicates that the responsibility that the dead bears has been transferred to the dreamer, and seeing taking money from the dead is also evidence that the dreamer is committing sins and mistakes in his life. He must stop moving in the wrong direction so that he does not regret it later. Interpretation of banknotes in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq Banknotes, according to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq in a dream, indicate that the dreamer has a good job opportunity in reality and will change his life for the better. The specialized online dream interpretation site is distinguished With a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet on Google. Paper money in a single woman’s dream. A dream about an unmarried girl who has paper money is evidence that she will achieve great success in her life and achieve the things she was pursuing, God willing. Banknotes in one’s dream also indicate that she has Valuable things, but she neglects them and does not know how to use them to her advantage. Paper money in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes abundance of sustenance, getting rid of distress, the end of sorrows and problems in her life, and the arrival of joy and happiness again. For an unmarried woman to see that she has lost banknotes in her dream, these The vision is a sign for this girl that she is missing many opportunities in her life that she should have taken advantage of. In the life of the dreamer, her life will change for the better and she will achieve great success in her professional life. Paper money in a dream for a married woman. For a married woman, seeing paper money in her dream indicates that in reality she is facing many financial problems and crises, and in this case the vision emerges from a feeling of need to Money.If a married woman dreams of getting some paper money in her dream, it means that in reality she feels comfortable and satisfied and that she will soon have a great source of livelihood and because of this, her life will change for the better. Strong will. Counting banknotes in a married woman’s dream is evidence that the dreamer is an ideal woman who can take responsibility and manage her life properly. Interpretation of a dream about someone who gave me notes for a married womanFor a married woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing concrete construction in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a concrete building in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin says: Seeing a concrete building in a dream may indicate the many difficulties that the viewer is going through and it will disappear. Also, seeing concrete in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has been deceived by one of his friends and will reveal it soon, and this indicates Easy and good news. Also, seeing a concrete building in a dream can indicate a new, stable, and spacious life, and the emergence of goodness and abundance, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing concrete pouring in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is building concrete, this indicates flexibility, strength, and activity. It shows her peace of mind. Also, seeing a concrete building in a dream indicates the collapse of one’s worries and the abundance of happiness and good news that will come to her skin soon, and God knows best. Also, seeing a concrete building in a dream indicates the marriage of an unmarried girl close to the man she loves, so it will be A good man, and God knows best. Seeing concrete in a dream indicates the distinction and brilliant success that an unmarried girl will achieve in her academic and professional life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a concrete building in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is building concrete, this indicates the collapse of disputes that arise in Her marital relationship. Also, seeing the concrete of the building indicates that many accumulated fears will leave, and it also indicates the liberation of her husband’s suffering and the arrival of happiness. Also, seeing a concrete building in a dream indicates achieving the goals and ambitions that you are trying to achieve soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a concrete building in A dream for a pregnant woman: If she sees a concrete structure in her dream, then the pregnant woman must remove her worries and facilitate her future affairs, for her and her husband, God willing. Also, seeing her building concrete in a dream may indicate the nearness of her due date and also the birth of a healthy child free of all diseases. Also, it may indicate Seeing concrete in a dream indicates success and academic excellence for her children and it may mean that her husband will enter a new job. Interpretation of seeing a concrete building in a dream for a man: If a man sees the concrete of a cement building in a dream, this indicates the death of his worries and the improvement of the coming conditions. Also, seeing a concrete building in The dream may indicate the abundance of the world, the abundance of livelihood and money, and joining a new trade. Also, seeing a concrete building in the dream may indicate the presence of a righteous woman who benefits people with the good she has and has money to help others. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in Comment below and our team of experts will get back to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of dreams by Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by Imam al-Sadiq: Continuing our journey that we began with the interpretation of dreams by Imam al-Sadiq, where we presented the interpretation of dreams starting with the letter hamza until we reach the letter jim. We will continue in this article. Interpretation of dreams according to Imam Al-Sadiq from the letter Ha so that we have the opportunity to speak from the letters, as the meanings of dreams are many and varied and their meanings differ according to the vision of the visible thing in the dream. Read also: Toilet in a dream Interpretation of the letter Ha in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Interpretation of dreams for Imam SadiqWallSeeing a wall in a dream symbolizes a strong man who prevents evil. Weave: Weaving symbolizes movement from one place to another and the intention to travel. Black Seeds: In a dream symbolizes the health of the dreamer. Love: Love in a dream symbolizes sadness and anxiety, and it is also a sign of death A sick person. Shoes: Shoes in a dream symbolize a man who seduces women. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of the letter Kha in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Bell: A ring in a dream symbolizes the birth of males, and breaking a ring in a dream symbolizes divorce. As for losing it in a dream, it means that the dreamer has lost his job. If the sleeper dreams that someone gave him a ring, this is a sign of marriage to a bachelor and childbirth to a pregnant woman. NecklaceBeads in dreams indicate that the sleeper will receive a lot of money. Sheep A sheep in a dream symbolizes the birth of a boy to a pregnant woman. Read also: Penguin in a dream, interpretation of a letter D in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqHome PageSeeing a house in dreams symbolizes achieving wealth for the dreamer if he is poor and alleviating distress if it is a new house. BroochSeeing a brooch in dreams is an undesirable dream, because it symbolizes unhappiness and unhappiness for the dreamer. ChickenSeeing a chicken in a dream symbolizes a beautiful girl Eating chicken in a dream portends to the dreamer. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of the appearance of the letter “Dhala” in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. WolfThe wolf in dreams symbolizes the oppressor as well as the enemy or thief. Corn grains in a dream symbolize a lot of money or an enemy characterized by malice and hatred. Remembering God in a dream: symbolizes To achieve victory after defeat. SinIf a person dreams that he has committed a sin in a dream, this is an indication that the dreamer has a debt that must be fulfilled. It is gold. Seeing gold in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will fall into misfortune, and among its connotations is also that the dreamer receives money Of inheritance, as gold in a dream indicates earning a living. Interpretation of the letter Ra in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: A large head in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s honor and vice versa. Seeing a small head means the dreamer’s lack of honor. As for seeing two heads in a dream, this indicates the birth of good offspring. Or marrying a human being. Comfort Comfort in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good wife or his wealth if he is poor. Monk Seeing a monk in a dream indicates the difficulty the dreamer faces in earning a living. Man Seeing a man in a dream indicates the money that the dreamer earns, but seeing a man barefoot This indicates the problems that the dreamer will face in the future

title: What is the interpretation of seeing torn shoes in a dream and what does it indicate?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing torn shoes in a dream and what does it indicate? Shoes are what a man wears on his feet to protect him from street pests, rocks, dust, and soil pests, as well as to protect him from heat and cold, apart from complaints and aesthetic appearance. Seeing shoes in a dream indicates an improvement in living conditions. The dreamer’s condition is good and the satisfaction of his desires, but seeing cut shoes means Problems, quarrels, or divorce, as well as taking off shoes may indicate divorce and may indicate the disappearance of tension. Therefore, we will give you the most important interpretation about seeing cut shoes in a dream and what it indicates. Seeing cut shoes while walking: A dream about cutting shoes is one of the visions that worries the fortuneteller, and it is a vision that does not It bodes well, indicates fatigue and suffering for the pioneer, and indicates problems and disagreements. Cutting shoes can indicate marital problems, separation, or the death of a loved one or friend. Seeing cut shoes for a divorced woman. Shoes in a dream Shoes in a dream indicate marriage to a divorced woman. But seeing The story of the shoe may indicate an unfinished relationship or fears and problems in her life. A torn shoe may indicate a break in her relationship with a loved one or a rupture of her bond with her family. Seeing cut shoes for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her shoes have been cut, then this It indicates the suffering and distress that you are going through. It also indicates a failure in emotional communication or a marriage that did not happen. Seeing torn shoes repaired indicates problems that will be corrected. Seeing torn shoes for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is wearing torn shoes, this indicates the presence of problems between her and her husband. If a married woman sees torn shoes, this indicates psychological problems, the pressures she is exposed to, and the disintegration of the family. Seeing torn shoes for a married man. Seeing brown shoes, and if a married man sees that he is wearing brown shoes, this indicates strength of character and steadfastness in his principles, ideas, status, and dignity. The same applies to finding a new job, and cutting shoes can lead to trouble or leaving his job. If a man sees that his shoes are torn, then this dream may indicate the loss of something valuable and precious to him, the loss of something important, the loss of a loved one or His friend. Or perhaps it is the problems and disagreements that can lead to separation. Or the commission of sins and transgressions. Seeing torn shoes in a dream: Torn shoes indicate the separation of a friend or lover. This dream can mean the loss of something precious and valuable to the dreamer. It can show what the dreamer is Sins and disobedience. Torn shoes also indicate problems and family quarrels. Broken shoes indicate a difficult period, troubles and increasing problems for the dreamer. Seeing someone with torn shoes can indicate a lack of academic qualifications or the loss of a loved one. Taking off torn shoes in a dream is one of the visions that... It may bode well and indicate a change of place and a better job opportunity. If one sees in a dream that he has lost his shoe, he loses it at sea or

title: Interpretation of a dream about a nail in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Claw in a dream: The nail is a hard material that covers the fingers and toes and it is very important to protect it from dirt and dust. Next few days or not? Does her vision differ between the dreamer being male or female? We will learn about all this and much more in detail in the following lines of the article. The nail in a dream. In the interpretation of a dream about a nail, scholars have mentioned many clues about it, the most important of which is what can be clarified through the following: If someone sees clean and well-groomed nails in his dream, this is a sign For his good morals and love for the world. If one sees dirty nails in a dream, this leads to the dreamer’s corruption and many mistakes. If a person suffering from illness dreams that his nails look beautiful, this is a sign of recovery and recovery soon. In the event that he sees broken nails during sleep and an injury The dream proves the aggravation of the dreamer’s disease, which may lead to death, God forbid. When a person sees in his dream that his nails have many scratches, this symbolizes the many debts that have accumulated on him or his dismissal from work. Confused and cannot find an explanation that reassures you? Search via Google on the website Secrets of Dream Interpretation. The nail in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - explained that the dream of a nail carries many interpretations, the most prominent of which are the following: Whoever sees his nails in his dream, this means his constant search and exertion of a lot of effort to achieve his goals. Which he will be able to achieve by the command of God Almighty. If someone dreams that he is filing his nails, this is a sign that he is able to overcome the obstacles he faces in this period of his life and permanently erase the past from his memory. And if someone sees during his sleep that he is painting his nails And that their color is impressive, this is a sign of happy events awaiting him soon and that God - Glory be to Him - will fulfill all his desires. Short nails in a dream symbolize abundant goodness and reform that will benefit all members of the dreamer’s family. Nail in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried girl dreams of nails, this is a sign On her relationship with a religious young man who enjoys the love of many people, as he seeks to reach the highest ranks and has many goals that he will be able to achieve, God willing. . If a girl’s nails in a dream look bad and are full of sores, this is a sign that she will marry a paralytic who will cause her a lot of harm and psychological harm, and she must stay away from him even before this happens. Late. As for seeing beautiful and elegant nails during an unmarried woman’s sleep, this symbolizes the transformation of her life for the better and her ability to achieve what she desires. Nail in a married woman’s dream. Seeing nails in a married woman’s dream indicates the arrival of happiness in her life after a long wait and a feeling of stability and comfort. Psychological and safety. If a married woman sees bad nails in her dream, this is a sign that in the coming days there will be a lot of quarrels with her partner. If a married woman dreams of nails painted red, this is a sign that God will give her good girls.

title: Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream and the meaning of its colors

preview.html: The chameleon is considered one of the reptiles that belong to the lizard family, and it is the largest category. The chameleon in a dream shows the presence of an evil and deceitful person in the life of the dreamer, and seeing him shows the worry, worry, and anguish that the dreamer suffers from in his life, as there are more than 80 species of descendants of lizards, and they are cold-blooded animals. It is characterized by its ability to quickly change the color of its skin and match the color of the surrounding environment. Explanation of its meaning: See the chameleon and colors in dreams. Chameleons are considered reptiles, but seeing them in a dream can disturb us and make the dreamer have many questions about the meaning of this vision and its repercussions in the dream, and through this article we try to clarify the opinions of interpreters. In this regard. The chameleon indicates a cunning and deceitful person, the envy and resentment of some people as well as their worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a red chameleon. Scientists believe that the red chameleon in their dreams indicates a kind of rivalry that indicates hostility and hatred, and seeing it in a dream is a warning to the dreamer not to get angry and emotional and to think carefully and patiently, as Chameleons can change color. Constantly skinning, indicates possible changes in the dreamer’s life. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a chameleon in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a green chameleon. The correct interpretation of seeing a green chameleon. It is clear from its color that it is free of problems and doubts. And that its presence in a dream is evidence of permanent food and good health, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream Yellow chameleonIt is a sign that dreamerIf you are sick or physically injured, this also indicates extreme jealousy and may also indicate failure. Read also: Dream interpretation of seeing a frog in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing a chameleon for a single womanInterpretation of seeing a chameleonFor individuals according to the color of the chameleon, when it is red, this interprets The need to abandon decisions made during this period. The chameleon in a dream shows the presence of an evil and deceitful person in the life of the dreamer, and seeing him shows the worry, worry, and anguish that the dreamer suffers from in his life, as there are more than 80 species of descendants of lizards, and they are cold-blooded animals. It is characterized by its ability to quickly change the color of its skin and match the color of the surrounding environment. Explanation of its meaning: See the chameleon and colors in dreams. Chameleons are considered reptiles, but seeing them in a dream can disturb us and make the dreamer have many questions about the meaning of this vision and its repercussions in the dream, and through this article we try to clarify the opinions of interpreters. title: The most important interpretations of seeing a pen in a dream

preview.html: A pen in a dream A pen is a writing tool and many interpreters differ in the meaning of a pen in a dream, but the majority of them see that it has a good meaning. A pen in a dream The interpretation of a dream about pens in a dream is evidence of gaining knowledge because it symbolizes a strong personality and when one sees that using a pen In a dream it indicates success in work, it can also indicate the dreamer's ability to overcome difficulties. Seeing a pen symbolizes the many changes that occur in a person’s life, apart from it being a lawful source of livelihood. The pen also symbolizes that the fortuneteller is a wise personality and has reason, and whoever sees that he has repented with the pen is one of the people of knowledge and people of jurisprudence in religion. Seeing the pen in a dream The student is evidence of the success of that student, and the many pens in the dreamer’s dream are evidence of the good that this dreamer will achieve. The pen in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a pen in a dream is an indication of the success that a person achieves in his work and believes that seeing a pen is also a sign of married life The turbulent life she is experiencing may indicate the problems surrounding her in her life. He also believes that pens in a dream indicate knowledge and indicate a ruler, and he believes that they may herald the birth of a male child in the family to which the dreamer belongs. Are you confused and cannot find an explanation that reassures you? Search via Google on the site Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams. A pen in a dream for a single woman. This vision is considered one of the good visions for a girl. Using a pen in a dream indicates the strength of his personality and his good conduct among people. Pens in a girl’s dream are a sign of an important change in her life, and whoever sees that she is buying a new pen indicates that she will achieve her desires and dreams in the future. Thus. If a girl sees that she has obtained a pen in a dream, she will be an important figure in her society and this indicates that she will achieve great success in her life and reach a high position. A pen in a dream for a married woman. This dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from many responsibilities and that he wants to get rid of these Responsibilities. Some commentators believe that a pen in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will hear good news. Whoever sees that he is writing on a white piece of paper in a dream, he will be blessed with an abundance of money from a lawful source of income. Or she will receive an inheritance from someone close to her. A pen in a dream for a pregnant woman. This dream indicates that this woman’s due date is approaching, and some believe that she will give birth to the child easily. Whoever sees that she is holding a pen and writing a name on a paper, this is a sign from God to name her son with the same name that she wrote on the paper. Whoever sees that her child gives him a pen in a dream, this is a sign that she will achieve something that she dreamed of, but did not tell anyone about it, and the dream is a sign of achieving and obtaining this thing. A pen in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a blue pen in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence that she will live her life steadily and calmly, and seeing a pen in a divorced woman’s dream is considered a praiseworthy vision because it indicates her joy. It will be in her life in the coming period. If a divorced woman sees a pen...

title: Interpretation of a dream about slippers in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Dreaming of slippers in a dream about Al-Asamit. Interpretation of dreams: Slippers in a dream. If they break off, this indicates some differences between the dreamer and some people in his life. If someone sees tight slippers in a dream, this indicates financial crises that the dreamer faces. As for the dream of taking off slippers in a dream, it is evidence of paying off a debt. And release them from suffering and obtain relief soon. Interpretation of a dream about slippers for unmarried women: A girl’s dream of beautiful slippers is a sign of kindness, happiness, and the approaching date of engagement. If he sees a set of slippers in a dream, this is a sign of achieving goals and dreams. Buying slippers in a dream is evidence of marriage soon, if the slippers are In the past. Interpretation of a dream about slippers for a married woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is wearing slippers and that they are white, this indicates the happiness that will be inside and stability in married life. A married woman’s dream of seeing golden slippers is a sign of wealth and blessing. As for the cut slippers in a married woman’s dream, they are a sign On worries and problems between husband and wife. Interpretation of a dream about slippers for a pregnant woman. The dream of seeing new slippers in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a new life full of happiness with the arrival of a new child. As for seeing wide slippers, it is a sign of easy birth. Seeing high-heeled slippers in a dream is a sign of Giving birth to a male child. Interpretation of a dream about slippers for a man: If a married man sees in a dream that he is wearing slippers, this indicates a difficult situation. Wearing tight slippers in a dream is an indication of the tension and extreme sadness in which he lives. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment Below the article, we will respond to it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of seeing trees in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing trees in a dream by Ibn Sirin The dream of a fruitful tree in a married woman's dream indicates stability with the partner and then obtaining a lot of sustenance, kindness and blessings. Interpretation of seeing a tree in a dream for a married woman But if she sees her children planting trees in a dream, this indicates kinship with relatives. As well as evidence of fairness to children and good parenting. While falling leaves in a dream, there are indications of multiple marital conflicts with the partner, and the husband may lose work or lose material. Seeing a fruit tree with green leaves, the dream indicates the end and disappearance of disputes and crises between the spouses and a happy life. Interpretation of sitting on a tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin I dreamed that I was sitting on a tree The dream indicates joy and happiness, through which the dreamer is very happy. Sitting on a tree in a dream also indicates the fulfillment of the desires and dreams that the dreamer is looking for. I saw a person in a dream The deceased sitting on the top of the tree, evidence of his life and position in the House of Justice. And if the tree is ugly and shocking, it needs prayer And charity. Seeing a person who fell from a tree sitting in a dream indicates healing by God’s grace, strength and improved health. I saw a single young man sitting on a tree in a dream indicates the kindness and beauty of the girl he will marry and be his life partner. Interpretation of green trees in a dream for a married woman Seeing a green tree The background in a married woman’s dream indicates a righteous and righteous husband who fears God. Interpretation of a dream about green fruit trees The dream shows that the dreamer’s heart is kind and stands out as a person of good character. But if he sees in a dream a tree with an ugly and bad shape, this indicates that he has bad qualities and bad morals at all. Dreaming of green trees in a dream means that the dreamer helps others and loves to do good. Then get ready to cut trees in a dream shows the separation of the womb and does not reach the womb. Fruit trees and flowers in a dream indicate a good, prosperous life, and God knows best. I dreamed in a dream of trees that are all fruits, and this is evidence that the woman has many blessings from the Creator. Rose bushes in a dream mean obtaining abundant sustenance, expanding it, and benefiting from it. I saw you in a dream A green fruitful tree and I am sitting at the bottom, because it is evidence of The Creator’s love and satisfaction with the dreamer. I saw in a dream beautiful green forms of trees, indicating that the dreamer is honest among people and in all his actions. Interpretation of seeing dry trees in a dream The dream Dry trees in a dream indicates failure, followed by the dreamer’s problems. The dry tree in a widow’s dream indicates sadness and suffering, then a feeling of separation from the husband. Interpretation of a dream of burning trees in a dream The dream Burning trees in a dream is a sign of general wear and tear for the dreamer, whether male or female. If a sick person sees in a dream that trees are burning, this indicates a noticeable deterioration in his health. Seeing a burning tree in a dream indicates the separation of the traveler or his loss and then returning dead. Interpretation of a dream of running between trees Seeing yourself running

title: Detailed interpretation of bread in a dream

preview.html: Today we present a topic about dreams. We are looking for an interpretation, and we are pleased to present to you in this article the interpretation of bread in a dream. The dream of baking bread in a dream indicates that the dreamer lives a pure life without worries, and indicates wealth and many good things in the life of the person who dreams. Bread is one of the basics of life. Human, but the interpretation of dreams also varies depending on the condition of the bread, whether it is. Refreshing, the dreamer lives a happy and enjoyable life with many of God’s gifts, and if it is moldy, it indicates illness, anxiety, and many interpretations that follow depending on the situation of the news. We will discuss them all in this article through an encyclopedia. Detailed interpretation of bread in a dream. Bread in a dream shows human rights in addition to The physical and psychological condition, and one’s ability to make personal decisions to rise without anyone’s help, because bread is enough to feed a person and seeing bread in a dream indicates the person’s satisfaction. Himself and does not need help from anyone. Now for you some explanations. Interpretation of seeing bread in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that if a person dreams that he is eating bread and it tastes delicious, this indicates that the dreamer enjoys good health and a long life. If he sees that he is eating bread with added ghee This indicates a significant increase in money and achieving many profits. If the color of the bread is fresh white, this means that the person lives a happy and fulfilling life and shows contentment and prosperity. If the bread is white and moldy, this indicates that the person suffers from extreme poverty and worries. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is distributing bread And he eats it with others, this indicates that person’s generosity and affection for those around him. If he sees in his dream that he is giving bread to the poor, this indicates that he will be in good health after he grows old. If one sees that he is eating a large amount of moldy bread, this indicates the presence of A large group of people is monitoring the dreamer’s livelihood. If he sees that he is preparing bread at home, this indicates a visit from a group of guests. Interpretation of seeing bread in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is eating stale bread, this indicates that there are many hypocrites in They are monitoring his own life. Seeing bread in a dream means that the dreamer will find a new job opportunity and fulfill his dreams and desires. Seeing yourself eating a piece of bread and leaving the rest is an unpleasant vision and means the death of one of the dreamer’s relatives or the dreamer’s short life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is making bread And she distributes it to the poor. This vision shows that she is a woman who loves kindness and loves helping the poor. Seeing herself buying white bread indicates achieving many goals and freedom from difficulties and fears. Seeing her eating brown bread indicates the distress of life, and it also indicates that the dreamer is going through a period in which he suffers from Lack of money. If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating moldy bread, this indicates that the girl is suffering from many difficulties in her life, and it also indicates that she is taking the effort of others and investing it in her personal life. Seeing cutting bread in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates
